thread.title: Dileep offers to revive Moideen foundation
thread.title_full: Dileep offers to revive Moideen foundation - The Times of India

author: Asha Prakash
title: Dileep offers to revive Moideen foundation
text:
R S Vimal's Ennu Ninte Moideen might be running to packed halls, but the real life characters behind the film have nothing much to celebrate.
It was a long cherished desire for Kanchanamala to open a charity organisation in the name of Moideen and help destitude women through it. But the organisation has now been reduced to a rundown shed. Actor Dileep has now come up with an offer to revive the organisation and said he will be helping Kanchanamala to give a second lease of life to it.
The offer has been applauded from all quarters, and many have even criticised the makers of the film for reaping profits without lifting a finger to help the real life people behind it.
